title: Sampling broken for discrete parameter types
body:
When sampling, min and max values of discrete parameters occur less frequent than expected.
See the following example:
```
In [1]: from emukit.core.categorical_parameter import CategoricalParameter, OrdinalEncoding                                                                                                                                                                                  
In [2]: from emukit.core import ParameterSpace, DiscreteParameter 
In [3]: import numpy as np                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
In [4]: space = ParameterSpace([CategoricalParameter('x', OrdinalEncoding([1, 2, 3])), DiscreteParameter('y', [1, 2, 3])])                                                                                                                                                       
In [5]: X = space.sample_uniform(100000)                                                                                                                                   
In [6]: np.bincount(X[:, 0])     # expected: close to array([    0, 33333, 33333, 33334])                                                                                                                                                                                                       
Out[6]: array([    0, 25162, 49901, 24937])
In [7]: np.bincount(X[:, 1])     # expected: close to array([    0, 33333, 33333, 33334])                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
Out[7]: array([    0, 24945, 50053, 25002])
```

This issue affects *at least* `CategoricalParameter-OrdinalEncoding` and `DiscreteParameter` with 
`ParameterSpace.sample_uniform`, `RandomDesign` and `LatinDesign`. 

The reason is quite obvious: We sample uniform in the range `[values.min, values.max)`, whereby we round the samples to the closest parameter value. 
This could be solved for `OrdinalEncoding` by simply expanding the bounds by (-0.5, +0.5), but this doesn't make sense for `DiscreteParameter`.

Cheers David
